SELECT SEQ_NOTI_NO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO "NOTIFICATION" VALUES(#{notiNo}, #{receiveMemberNo}, DEFAULT, #{notiContent}, DEFAULT, #{notiUrl}, DEFAULT, #{sendMemberNo})
mapper.select: SELECT NOTI_NO, NOTI_CONTENT, READ_CHECK, NOTI_URL, SEND_MEMBER_NO, RECEIVE_MEMBER_NO, CASE WHEN TRUNC(NOTI_DATE) = TRUNC(CURRENT_DATE) THEN TO_CHAR(NOTI_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ELSE TO_CHAR(NOTI_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') END AS NOTI_DATE FROM "NOTIFICATION" JOIN "MEMBER" ON (SEND_MEMBER_NO = "MEMBER".MEMBER_NO) WHERE RECEIVE_MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY NOTI_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "NOTIFICATION" WHERE RECEIVE_MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND READ_CHECK = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "NOTIFICATION" ( NOTI_NO, RECEIVE_MEMBER_NO, READ_CHECK, NOTI_CONTENT, NOTI_URL, SEND_MEMBER_NO, NOTI_TYPE ) SELECT SEQ_NOTI_NO.NEXTVAL, PL.RECEIVE_MEMBER_NO, 'N', '팔로우한 작가가 새로운 작품을 업로드했습니다.', '/piece/onlineDetail/' || P.PIECE_NO, P.MEMBER_NO AS SEND_MEMBER_NO, 'F' FROM PIECE_LIKE PL JOIN PIECE P ON PL.PIECE_NO = P.PIECE_NO WHERE P.START_DATE = TRUNC(SYSDATE + #{daysBefore})

INSERT INTO "NOTIFICATION" ( NOTI_NO, RECEIVE_MEMBER_NO, READ_CHECK, NOTI_CONTENT, NOTI_URL, SEND_MEMBER_NO, NOTI_TYPE ) SELECT SEQ_NOTI_NO.NEXTVAL, PL.RECEIVE_MEMBER_NO, 'N', '찜한 경매가 1시간 뒤에 시작됩니다.', '/auction/details/' || P.PIECE_NO, P.MEMBER_NO, 'W' FROM PIECE_LIKE PL JOIN PIECE P ON PL.PIECE_NO = P.PIECE_NO WHERE P.START_DATE = TRUNC(SYSDATE + #{daysBefore}) AND P.PIECE_TYPE = 2;
